SELECT TR_DT , ARDY_BZEP_NO , FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , TR_SN , RNDR_DCD , SPC_DEP_ITEM_KND_CD , SPC_WDR_ITEM_KND_CD , SYNS_TEXT , TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO , RNDR_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN RNDR_DCD = 1 THEN RNDR_AMT WHEN RNDR_DCD = 2 THEN -RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) OVER( ORDER BY TR_DT , RNDR_DCD ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) AS RNDR_BLCE , ISTT_CD , ACNO , SORT_NO , RMRK FROM IBIMS902B WHERE 1=1 AND FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = #{fincExcuRqsSn} ORDER BY TR_DT , RNDR_DCD;
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO IBIMS902B T1 USING ( SELECT TR_DT , ARDY_BZEP_NO , FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , TR_SN , RNDR_DCD , SPC_DEP_ITEM_KND_CD , SPC_WDR_ITEM_KND_CD , SYNS_TEXT , TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO , RNDR_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN RNDR_DCD = 1 THEN RNDR_AMT WHEN RNDR_DCD = 2 THEN -RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) OVER ( PARTITION BY ARDY_BZEP_NO, FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN ORDER BY SORT_NO ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) AS RNDR_BLCE , ISTT_CD , ACNO , SORT_NO , RMRK FROM IBIMS902B WHERE 1=1 AND ARDY_BZEP_NO = #{ardyBzepNo} AND FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = #{fincExcuRqsSn} ORDER BY ARDY_BZEP_NO , FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , SORT_NO ) UPDATE_LIST ON (T1.TR_DT = UPDATE_LIST.TR_DT AND T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO = UPDATE_LIST.ARDY_BZEP_NO AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = UPDATE_LIST.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN AND T1.TR_SN = UPDATE_LIST.TR_SN) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T1.RNDR_BLCE = UPDATE_LIST.RNDR_BLCE
